name: Lucid Nightmare (NaughtSilt)
description:
IMPORTANT - WHEN THE WEBGL STARTS, JUST PRESS "OK" IF THE ERROR POPS UP

This is Lucid Nightmare! This is one of my first games, and I really tried my best combining my skills and trying to make a fun game. This is meant to be played for about 5 - 10 minutes, so please don't expect much.

Made for the Mini Jam 105

The theme was Dreamy and the limitation was Every Playthrough is Unique

Try your best to get through the game, there are 3 levels, all with the same design but differing difficulties.

- Controls -
Move - Arrow Keys / WASD

Jump - Space

Restart to last checkpoint - R

I used the Tarodev character controller which is AMAZING i totally recommend checking it out.

All other code, art, music, SFX, etc. were made my be.
